description: This slow cooker osso bucco is fall apart tender and flavour packed, a perfect Italian feast.
name: Slow Cooker Osso Bucco Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 veal shin, bone and marrow in
0.5 cup beef stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Dust each veal shin with flour. Heat the butter and oil in a large, deep pan until sizzling. Working in batches, seal the veal shins for 3 minutes on each side. Set aside on a plate.

Tip in the onions, carrots and celery and cook for 6-8 minutes until softened. Pour in the wine and cook for 2 minutes until reduced. Add the veal back to the pan, pour over the stock and chopped tomatoes, cover and bring to the boil.
Tip the mix into the slow cooker and cook on low for 5-6 hours until the veal is tender.
